summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5002 for the improvement of the alleys in blocks 9, 10, 11 and 12, Pettit's University Addition, and the alley in block 5, Interlake Addition, and the alleys deeded under Ordinance No. 17736 and Ordinance No. 24247, being the alleys from East 45th Street to East 56th Street, between 10th Avenue Northeast and 11th Avenue Northeast, by paving and otherwise improving the same.
